Name: Mine the Gold
About the game: Gold, diamonds, and dynamite? That's right, you're a goldminer and it's your job to mine as much gold as you can and come out with the most money. Are you ready? Time to goldrush! Make Money, Earn a Trillion and be a Trillionaire! Make money. Make it big. Mine it Hard! Game Features: - Addictive gameplay, feel gold rush as well gold run - Classical graphics with a friendly user interface - Dynamic sounds & music
